# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(tut_max_avg_subarray_1 LANGUAGES CXX)

# target
add_executable(tut_max_avg_subarray_1 "")
set_target_properties(tut_max_avg_subarray_1 PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "tut_max_avg_subarray_1")
set_target_properties(tut_max_avg_subarray_1 PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/macosx/arm64/debug")
target_include_directories(tut_max_avg_subarray_1 SYSTEM PRIVATE
    /usr/local/include
)
target_compile_definitions(tut_max_avg_subarray_1 PRIVATE
    GTEST_HAS_PTHREAD=1
)
target_compile_options(tut_max_avg_subarray_1 PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-target>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-target>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:arm64-apple-macos15.1>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:arm64-apple-macos15.1>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-isysroot>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-isysroot>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX15.1.sdk>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX15.1.sdk>
)
set_target_properties(tut_max_avg_subarray_1 PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(tut_max_avg_subarray_1 PRIVATE cxx_std_23)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(tut_max_avg_subarray_1 PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(tut_max_avg_subarray_1 PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(tut_max_avg_subarray_1 PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(tut_max_avg_subarray_1 PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET tut_max_avg_subarray_1 PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(tut_max_avg_subarray_1 PRIVATE
    gtest_main
    gtest
)
target_link_directories(tut_max_avg_subarray_1 PRIVATE
    /usr/local/lib
)
target_link_options(tut_max_avg_subarray_1 PRIVATE
    -target
    arm64-apple-macos15.1
    -isysroot
    /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX15.1.sdk
    -lz
)
target_sources(tut_max_avg_subarray_1 PRIVATE
    src/main.cpp
)
